title: Calories in 1 Cup of Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in sugar 1 cup, including full nutrition breakdown per serving, carbs, sugars, and easy tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: Granulated white sugar; 1 US cup ≈ 200 g, level measure, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type (e.g., brown, powdered), brand, and packing density. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup (200 g) of granulated sugar provides about 774 calories, all from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup of granulated sugar?

faqs.a: Yes, nearly 100% carbohydrates (200 g carbs in 1 cup), all as sugars.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in 1 cup?
faqs.a: About 200 grams of granulated white sugar.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have the same calories as white?
faqs.a: Similar, but slightly less—around 760 kcal per cup vs. 774 for white.

faqs.q: What if I pack the sugar?
faqs.a: Packed cups weigh more (up to 220 g), increasing calories to ~850 kcal.
